definition: innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Still, I'd like to see more innovation in content aggregators on the iPad.
sentences.chinese: 我依旧想在iPad内容聚合器上看到更多的创新。

sentences.english: His approach is both innovative and thought-provoking.
sentences.chinese: 他的方法是创新的和令人深思的。

sentences.english: And they should carry on the self-innovation constantly and pay attention to form the fund brand.
sentences.chinese: 并且要不断进行自我创新，注重打造基金品牌。

sentences.english: This process will certainly open up broad prospects for theoretical innovation.
sentences.chinese: 这一过程必将为理论创新开辟广阔前景。

sentences.english: Huangyuan now ranked in the traditional lamp based on skills and innovation.
sentences.chinese: 如今的湟源排灯在传统技艺的基础上又有了创新。

sentences.english: He responded to the customers' needs by innovating.
sentences.chinese: 他以创新来应抵泯灭者的需求。

sentences.english: Only through creating & innovating, can one make progress continuously.
sentences.chinese: 只有开拓创新，才能不断前进。

sentences.english: I think it means re-booting your brain.
sentences.chinese: 我认为创新意味着重启你的大脑。

sentences.english: Humour in the ads is a recent innovation, but parodies of them are plentiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告中幽默这一创新出现不久，却被到处效颦。

sentences.english: So, the main idea to overcome County-township fiscal dilemma is the institutional innovation.
sentences.chinese: 因此，县乡财政解困的主要途径还是制度创新。

sentences.english: That’s your big sales innovation? Sheesh.
sentences.chinese: 那就是你们重要的销售创新？

sentences.english: Hu calls on teachers to embrace innovation.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛要求教师要勇于创新。

sentences.english: Your flair for the creative takes an important place in your life.
sentences.chinese: 对创新的鉴别力是你人生的重要成分。

sentences.english: The other major innovation in this example is the use of formatted printing.
sentences.chinese: 本例中的另一项主要创新是使用了格式化打印。

sentences.english: Run out of breakfast, I logged an innovative composition network, began to publish the article.
sentences.chinese: 用完早餐，我又登录了创新作文网，开始发表文章。

sentences.english: At the same time, Li Shizhen Medicine Innovation Award is presented at first.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，李时珍医药创新奖也在会上首次颁发。

definition: to push out the old and bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
abreast of modern developments/to keep up with the times/progressive/timely
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
